Sovereign.name: Cabbage Corp

Events.GetGlobalDockScreen:
(switch
; This only applies to Cabbage Corp stations
(not (objMatches gSource Nil "sTAV +Cabbage;")) Nil
; If the ship is radioactive then we refuse docking
(shpIsRadioactive gPlayerShip) (if (objHasAttribute gSource "corporateDecon") (list &dsCommonwealthDecon; 10) (list &dsRefuseContamination; 10) )
; If the player has committed crimes, then they're in trouble
(geq (int (objGetData gPlayerShip "CCCrimeSeverity")) 2) (list &dsCCCabbageExecution; 8)
Nil )
Events.OnGlobalPlayerEnteredSystem:
; This script runs every time because the stations reset their inventories every time you enter the system. ; This script seems to be unreliable, it may not run if you spawn in the system and may not properly detect ; the system name.
(block Nil (enum (sysFindObject Nil "T +unid:0x00102003;") theMiningStation ; Applies to every Commonwealth mining colony in the system
(block Nil (objEnumItems theMiningStation "* +cabbageCorp;" theMiningItem (objRemoveItem theMiningStation theMiningItem) ) ; Remove all Cabbage Corp items to start from scratch
(if (eq (sysGetName) "Eridani") (block Nil (objAddRandomItems theMiningStation &trCCMiningWeapon1; (random 1 3)) (objAddRandomItems theMiningStation &trCCMiningDevice1; (random 1 2)) ) ; Adds 1d3 random mining weapons and 1d2 random mining devices ; between levels 1 and 3 if the system is "Eridani"
(block Nil (objAddRandomItems theMiningStation &trCCMiningWeapon2; (random 1 3)) (objAddRandomItems theMiningStation &trCCMiningDevice2; (random 1 3)) ) ; Adds 1d3 random mining weapons and 1d3 random mining devices ; between levels 1 and 5 if the system is not "Eridani" ) ) ) (enum (sysFindObject Nil "T +unid:0x008102D2;") theMiningStation ; Applies to every IMU Local station in the system
(block Nil (objEnumItems theMiningStation "* +cabbageCorp;" theMiningItem (objRemoveItem theMiningStation theMiningItem) ) ; Remove all Cabbage Corp items to start from scratch
(block Nil (objAddRandomItems theMiningStation &trCCMiningWeapon3; (random 1 4)) (objAddRandomItems theMiningStation &trCCMiningDevice3; (random 1 4)) ) ; Adds 1d4 random mining weapons and 1d4 random mining devices ; between levels 4 and 8 ) ) (sysSetData "CabbageMiningBalance" 1) )

Sovereign.DisplayAttributes:
; Applies company name or generic label to items
; This is used for devices that can be modified, to differentiate between modified and unmodified versions
; Things man was not meant to know
